results.content:
이 강좌를 듣는 분은 기본적으로 자바 스크립트를 알고 있다는 전제 하에 자바 스크립트는 빼고 , 본 meteor 에 충실 해주기 바랍니다.
버전을 최근 버전으로 변경 하고 구조를 좀더 상세히 설명했으면 합니다.
results.content_html:
이 강좌를 듣는 분은 기본적으로 자바 스크립트를 알고 있다는 전제 하에 자바 스크립트는 빼고 , 본 meteor 에 충실 해주기 바랍니다.
버전을 최근 버전으로 변경 하고 구조를 좀더 상세히 설명했으면 합니다.

results.content: Very thorough, great course for beginners wanting to tackle meteor. Small cons - custom application developing throughout the course is very basic. Also, author demonstrate creating of meteor simple-todo (which can be good thing, if you prefer to watch video instead of working througth said example on meteor.js site). Overall, this is a good course for beginners.
results.content_html: Very thorough, great course for beginners wanting to tackle meteor. Small cons - custom application developing throughout the course is very basic. Also, author demonstrate creating of meteor simple-todo (which can be good thing, if you prefer to watch video instead of working througth said example on meteor.js site). Overall, this is a good course for beginners.

results.content: The explanation is very clear even for novice users.
results.content_html: The explanation is very clear even for novice users.

results.content:
The presentation is good in general and the base concepts are well explained. 

On the bad side, some videos are poorly edited (lots of cut offs) with some missing words, which does'nt facilitate a good understanding of the material.
results.content_html:
The presentation is good in general and the base concepts are well explained.

On the bad side, some videos are poorly edited (lots of cut offs) with some missing words, which does'nt facilitate a good understanding of the material.

results.content: Its a good course but needs improvements.
results.content_html: Its a good course but needs improvements.

results.content: Seems good so far but I'm just getting started. I hope we will be setting up a development environment soon and that I will be able to follow along from my Linux desktop.
results.content_html: Seems good so far but I'm just getting started. I hope we will be setting up a development environment soon and that I will be able to follow along from my Linux desktop.

results.content: thanks a lot of good examples
A hands-on experience in Meteor. Its provides a complete overview of meteor and helps in understanding it better with practical example and usage scenarios.
results.content_html: A hands-on experience in Meteor. Its provides a complete overview of meteor and helps in understanding it better with practical example and usage scenarios.

results.content: It would be more useful if we have the code or exercises to test the knowledge
